member.name: T:CommonMark.CommonMarkAdditionalFeatures
member.summary: Lists additional features that can be enabled in . These features are not part of the standard and should not be used if interoperability with other CommonMark implementations is required.

member.name: F:CommonMark.CommonMarkAdditionalFeatures.None
member.summary: No additional features are enabled. This is the default.

member.name: F:CommonMark.CommonMarkAdditionalFeatures.StrikethroughTilde
member.summary: The parser will recognize syntax ~~foo~~ that will be rendered as <del>foo</del>.

member.name: F:CommonMark.CommonMarkAdditionalFeatures.All
member.summary: All additional features are enabled.

member.name: T:CommonMark.CommonMarkConverter
member.summary: Contains methods for parsing and formatting CommonMark data.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkConverter.ProcessStage1(System.IO.TextReader,CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings)
member.summary: Performs the first stage of the conversion - parses block elements from the source and created the syntax tree.
member.param: The reader that contains the source data.
The object containing settings for the parsing process.
member.returns: The block element that represents the document.
member.exception: when errors occur during block parsing.
when error occur while reading the data.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkConverter.ProcessStage2(CommonMark.Syntax.Block,CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings)
member.summary: Performs the second stage of the conversion - parses block element contents into inline elements.
member.param: The top level document element.
The object containing settings for the parsing process.
member.exception: when does not represent a top level document.
when errors occur during inline parsing.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkConverter.ProcessStage3(CommonMark.Syntax.Block,System.IO.TextWriter,CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings)
member.summary: Performs the last stage of the conversion - converts the syntax tree to HTML representation.
member.param: The top level document element.
The target text writer where the result will be written to.
The object containing settings for the formatting process.
member.exception: when does not represent a top level document.
when error occur while writing the data to the target.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkConverter.Convert(System.IO.TextReader,System.IO.TextWriter,CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings)
member.summary: Converts the given source data and writes the result directly to the target.
member.param: The reader that contains the source data.
The target text writer where the result will be written to.
The object containing settings for the parsing and formatting process.
member.exception: when errors occur during parsing or formatting.
when error occur while reading or writing the data.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkConverter.Convert(System.String,CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings)
member.summary: Converts the given source data and returns the result as a string.
member.param: The source data.
The object containing settings for the parsing and formatting process.
member.exception: when errors occur during parsing or formatting.

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkConverter.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: Gets the CommonMark assembly version number. Note that might differ from the actual release version since the assembly version is not always incremented to reduce possible reference errors when updating.

member.name: T:CommonMark.CommonMarkException
member.summary: An exception that is caught during CommonMark parsing or formatting.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkException.#ctor(System.String,CommonMark.Syntax.Inline,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message, a reference to the element that caused it and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The inline element that is related to the exception cause.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkException.#ctor(System.String,CommonMark.Syntax.Block,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message, a reference to the element that caused it and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The block element that is related to the exception cause.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkException.BlockElement
member.summary: Gets the block that caused the exception. Can be null.

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkException.InlineElement
member.summary: Gets the inline element that caused the exception. Can be null.

member.name: T:CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings
member.summary: Class used to configure the behavior of .

member.name: M:CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings.Clone
member.summary: Creates a copy of this configuration object.

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings.OutputFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the output format used by the last stage of conversion.

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings.RenderSoftLineBreaksAsLineBreaks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether soft line breaks should be rendered as hard line breaks.

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings.AdditionalFeatures
member.summary: Gets or sets any additional features (that are not present in the current CommonMark specification) that the parser and/or formatter will recognize.

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings.UriResolver
member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate that is used to resolve addresses during rendering process. Can be used to process application relative URLs (~/foo/bar).

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings.Default
member.summary: The default settings for the converter. If the properties of this instance are modified, the changes will be applied to all future conversions that do not specify their own settings.

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings.InlineParsers
member.summary: Gets the delegates that parse inline elements according to these settings.

member.name: P:CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings.InlineParserSpecialCharacters
member.summary: Gets the characters that have special meaning for inline element parsers according to these settings.

member.name: T:CommonMark.OutputFormat
member.summary: Specifies different formatters supported by the converter.

member.name: F:CommonMark.OutputFormat.Html
member.summary: The output is standard HTML format according to the CommonMark specification.

member.name: F:CommonMark.OutputFormat.SyntaxTree
member.summary: The output is a debug view of the syntax tree. Usable for debugging.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.EntityDecoder.DecodeEntity(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes the given HTML entity to the matching Unicode characters.
member.param: The entity without & and ; symbols, for example, copy.
member.returns: The unicode character set or null if the entity was not recognized.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.EntityDecoder.DecodeEntity(System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes the given UTF-32 character code to the matching set of UTF-16 characters.
member.returns: The unicode character set or null if the entity was not recognized.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.EntityDecoder._entityMap
member.summary: Source: http://www.w3.org/html/wg/drafts/html/master/syntax.html#named-character-references

member.name: T:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack
member.summary: Describes an element in a stack of possible inline openers.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack.Priority
member.summary: The parser priority if this stack entry.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack.Previous
member.summary: Previous entry in the stack. null if this is the last one.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack.Next
member.summary: Next entry in the stack. null if this is the last one.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack.StartingInline
member.summary: The at-the-moment text inline that could be transformed into the opener.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack.DelimeterCount
member.summary: The number of delimeter characters found for this opener.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack.Delimeter
member.summary: The character that was used in the opener.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack.StartPosition
member.summary: The position in the where this inline element was found. Used only if the specific parser requires this information.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack.Flags
member.summary: The flags set for this stack entry.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack.RemoveStackEntry(CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack,CommonMark.Parser.Subject,CommonMark.Parser.InlineStack)
member.summary: Removes a subset of the stack.
member.param: The first entry to be removed.
The subject associated with this stack. Can be null if the pointers in the subject should not be updated.
The last entry to be removed. Can be null if everything starting from has to be removed.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Parser.ScannerCharacterMatcher
member.summary: Class containing methods for fast forward matching of string contents

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.ScannerCharacterMatcher.MatchWhitespaces(System.String,System.Char@,System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves along the given string as long as the current character is a whitespace.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.ScannerCharacterMatcher.MatchAsciiLetter(System.String,System.Char@,System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves along the given string as long as the current character is a ASCII letter.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.ScannerCharacterMatcher.MatchAsciiLetterOrDigit(System.String,System.Char@,System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves along the given string as long as the current character is a ASCII letter or digit.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.ScannerCharacterMatcher.MatchAsciiLetterOrDigit(System.String,System.Char@,System.Int32@,System.Int32,System.Char,System.Char,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Moves along the given string as long as the current character is a ASCII letter or digit or one of the given additional characters.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.ScannerCharacterMatcher.MatchAsciiLetterOrDigit(System.String,System.Char@,System.Int32@,System.Int32,System.Char)
member.summary: Moves along the given string as long as the current character is a ASCII letter or digit or one of the given additional characters.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.ScannerCharacterMatcher.MatchAsciiLetter(System.String,System.Char@,System.Int32@,System.Int32,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Moves along the given string as long as the current character is a ASCII letter or one of the given additional characters.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner
member.summary: Contains the regular expressions that are used in the parsers.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_html_tag(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Try to match an HTML tag after first <, returning number of chars matched.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.schemeArray
member.summary: List of valid schemes of an URL. The array must be sorted.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_autolink_uri(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Try to match URI autolink after first <, returning number of chars matched.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_autolink_email(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Try to match email autolink after first <, returning num of chars matched.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_html_block_tag(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Try to match an HTML block tag including first <.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_link_url(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Try to match a URL in a link or reference, return number of chars matched. This may optionally be contained in <..>; otherwise whitespace and unbalanced right parentheses aren't allowed. Newlines aren't ever allowed.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_link_title(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Try to match a link title (in single quotes, in double quotes, or in parentheses), returning number of chars matched. Allow one level of internal nesting (quotes within quotes).

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_spacechars(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Match space characters, including newlines.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_atx_header_start(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Match ATX header start.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_setext_header_line(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Match sexext header line. Return 1 for level-1 header, 2 for level-2, 0 for no match.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_hrule(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Scan a horizontal rule line: "...three or more hyphens, asterisks, or underscores on a line by themselves. If you wish, you may use spaces between the hyphens or asterisks."

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_open_code_fence(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Scan an opening code fence. Returns the number of characters forming the fence.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_close_code_fence(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Scan a closing code fence with length at least len.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.Scanner.scan_entity(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Scans an entity. Returns number of chars matched.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.Block
member.summary: Represents a block-level element of the parsed document.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.#ctor(CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type of the element this instance represents.
The number of the first line in the source text that contains this element.
The number of the first column (within the first line) in the source text that contains this element.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.AsEnumerable
member.summary: Returns an enumerable that allows the iteration over all block and inline elements within this instance. Note that the enumerator should not be used if optimal performance is desired and instead a custom implementation should be written.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.CreateDocument
member.summary: Creates a new top-level document block.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the element this instance represents.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.StartLine
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of the first line in the source text that contains this element.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.StartColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of the first column (within the first line) in the source text that contains this element.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.EndLine
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of the last line in the source text that contains this element.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this block element has been completed (and thus new lines cannot be added to it) or is still open. By default all elements are created as open and are closed when the parser detects it.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.IsLastLineBlank
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the last line parsed for this block element was blank (containing only whitespaces).

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.FirstChild
member.summary: Gets or sets the first child element of this instance. null if there are no children.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.LastChild
member.summary: Gets or sets the last child element (the last sibling of ) of this instance. null if there are no children.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.Parent
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent element of this block.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the root element (that represents the document itself).

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.StringContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the string content of this block. The content consists of multiple string parts to avoid string concatenation. Note that some parts of the parser (for example, ) might assume that the parts are not split within certain objects, so it is advised that the parts are split on newline.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.InlineContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the first inline element that was parsed from property. Note that once the inlines are parsed, will be set to null.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.ListData
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional properties that apply to list elements.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.FencedCodeData
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional properties that apply to fenced code blocks.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.HeaderLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the heading level (as in <h1> or <h2>).

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.ReferenceMap
member.summary: Gets or sets the dictionary containing resolved link references. Only set on the document node, null and not used for all other elements.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.NextSibling
member.summary: Gets or sets the next sibling of this block element. null if this is the last element.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Block.Previous
member.summary: Gets or sets the previous sibling of this block element. null if this is the first element.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.BlockMethods.EndsWithBlankLine(CommonMark.Syntax.Block)
member.summary: Check to see if a block ends with a blank line, descending if needed into lists and sublists.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.BlockMethods.BreakOutOfLists(CommonMark.Syntax.Block@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Break out of all containing lists

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.BlockMethods.CreateChildBlock(CommonMark.Syntax.Block,CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a new block as child of another. Return the child.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.BlockMethods.ProcessInlines(CommonMark.Syntax.Block,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,CommonMark.Syntax.Reference},CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings)
member.summary: Walk through the block, its children and siblings, parsing string content into inline content where appropriate.
member.param: The document level block from which to start the processing.
The reference mapping used when parsing links.
The settings that influence how the inline parsing is performed.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.BlockMethods.ParseListMarker(System.String,System.Int32,CommonMark.Syntax.ListData@)
member.summary: Attempts to parse a list item marker (bullet or enumerated). On success, returns length of the marker, and populates data with the details. On failure, returns 0.
member.remarks: Original: int parse_list_marker(string ln, int pos, ref ListData dataptr)

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag
member.summary: Specifies the element type of a instance.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.Document
member.summary: The root element that represents the document itself. There should only be one in the tree.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.BlockQuote
member.summary: A block-quote element.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.List
member.summary: A list element. Will contain nested blocks with type of .

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.ListItem
member.summary: An item in a block element of type .

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.FencedCode
member.summary: A code block element that was formatted with fences (for example, ~~~\nfoo\n~~~).

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.IndentedCode
member.summary: A code block element that was formatted by indenting the lines with at least 4 spaces.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.HtmlBlock
member.summary: A raw HTML code block element.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.Paragraph
member.summary: A paragraph block element.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.AtxHeader
member.summary: A header element that was parsed from an ATX style markup (## heading 2).

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.SETextHeader
member.summary: A header element that was parsed from a Setext style markup (heading\n========).

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.HorizontalRuler
member.summary: A horizontal ruler element.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.BlockTag.ReferenceDefinition
member.summary: A text block that contains only link reference definitions.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.EnumeratorEntry
member.summary: Represents a single element in the document tree when traversing through it with the enumerator.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.EnumeratorEntry.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,CommonMark.Syntax.Block)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Specifies if this instance represents the opening of the block element.

Specifies if this instance represents the closing of the block element (returned by the enumerator after the children have been enumerated). Both and can be specified at the same time if there are no children for the element.
The block element being returned from the enumerator.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.EnumeratorEntry.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,CommonMark.Syntax.Inline)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Specifies if this instance represents the opening of the inline element.

Specifies if this instance represents the closing of the inline element (returned by the enumerator after the children have been enumerated). Both and can be specified at the same time if there are no children for the element.
The inlien element being returned from the enumerator.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.EnumeratorEntry.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.EnumeratorEntry.IsOpening
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether this instance represents the opening of the element (returned before enumerating over the children of the element).

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.EnumeratorEntry.IsClosing
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether this instance represents the closing of the element (returned by the enumerator after the children have been enumerated). Both and can be true at the same time if there are no children for the given element.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.EnumeratorEntry.Inline
member.summary: Gets the inline element. Can be null if is set.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.EnumeratorEntry.Block
member.summary: Gets the inline element. Can be null if is set.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.FencedCodeData
member.summary: Contains additional data for fenced code blocks. Used in /

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of characters that were used in the opening code fence.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.FencedCodeData.FenceOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of spaces the opening fence was indented.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.FencedCodeData.FenceChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the character that is used in the fences.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.FencedCodeData.Info

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Inline.Tag
member.summary: Gets of sets the type of the inline element this instance represents.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Inline.LiteralContent
member.summary:
Gets or sets the literal content of this element. This is only used if the property specifies a type that can have literal content.
Note that for this property contains the title of the link.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Inline.TargetUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the target URL for this element. Only used for and .

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Inline.FirstChild
member.summary: Gets or sets the first descendant of this element. This is only used if the property specifies a type that can have nested elements.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Inline.Linkable
member.summary: Gets the link details. This is now obsolete in favor of and properties and this property will be removed in future.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Inline.NextSibling
member.summary: Gets the next sibling inline element. Returns null if this is the last element.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Inline.LastSibling
member.summary: Gets the last sibling of this inline. If no siblings are defined, returns self.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineMethods.InitializeParsers(CommonMark.CommonMarkSettings)
member.summary: Initializes the array of delegates for inline parsing.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineMethods.NormalizeReference(CommonMark.Syntax.StringPart)
member.summary: Collapses internal whitespace to single space, removes leading/trailing whitespace, folds case.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineMethods.NormalizeWhitespace(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Collapses consecutive space and newline characters into a single space. Additionaly removes leading and trailing spaces.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineMethods.ScanEmphasisDelimeters(CommonMark.Parser.Subject,System.Char,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Scans the subject for a series of the given emphasis character, testing if they could open and/or close an emphasis element.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineMethods.ParseStringEntities(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new element that represents string content but the given content is processed to decode any HTML entities in it.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineMethods.Unescape(System.String)
member.summary: Destructively unescape a string: remove backslashes before punctuation or symbol characters.
member.param: The string data that will be changed by unescaping any punctuation or symbol characters.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineMethods.CleanUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Clean a URL: remove surrounding whitespace and surrounding < > and remove \ that escape punctuation and other symbols.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineMethods.CleanTitle(System.String)
member.summary: Clean a title: remove surrounding quotes and remove \ that escape punctuation.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Parser.InlineMethods.ParseReferenceLabel(CommonMark.Parser.Subject)
member.summary:
Parses the contents of [..] for a reference label. Only used for parsing reference definition labels for use with the reference dictionary because it does not properly parse nested inlines.
Assumes the source starts with '[' character or spaces before '['. Returns null and does not advance if no matching ] is found. Note the precedence: code backticks have precedence over label bracket markers, which have precedence over *, _, and other inline formatting markers. So, 2 below contains a link while 1 does not: 1. [a link `with a ](/url)` character 2. [a link *with emphasized ](/url) text* ///

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineContentLinkable
member.summary: An obsolete class. Used to contain properties specific to link inline elements.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineContentLinkable.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of a link. Moved to .

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineContentLinkable.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of a link. Moved to .

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag
member.summary: Specifies the element type of an instance.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.String
member.summary: Represents a simple literal string content. Uses to specify the data. Cannot contain nested elements.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.SoftBreak
member.summary: Represents a soft-break which by default is rendered as a simple newline and thus does not impact the display of the resulting HTML code. The property can be used to override this behavior and render soft-breaks as <br;> HTML elements. Cannot contain literal content or nested elements.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.LineBreak
member.summary: Represents a line-break which by default is rendered as a <br;> HTML element. Cannot contain literal content or nested elements.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.Code
member.summary: Represents an inline code element. Uses to specify the data. Cannot contain nested elements.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.RawHtml
member.summary: Represents raw HTML code. Uses to specify the data. Cannot contain nested elements.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.Emphasis
member.summary: Represents an emphasis element. Uses to specify the contents. Cannot contain literal content.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.Strong
member.summary: Represents a strong emphasis element. Uses to specify the contents. Cannot contain literal content.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.Link
member.summary: Represents a link element. Uses to specify the content (or label). Uses to specify the target of the link and to store the title of the link.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.Image
member.summary: Represents an image element. Uses to specify the label (description). Uses to specify the source of the image and to store the title of the image.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.InlineTag.Strikethrough
member.summary: Represents an inline element that has been "removed" (visually represented as strikethrough). Only present if the is enabled.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.ListData
member.summary: Contains additional data for list block elements. Used in property.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.ListData.MarkerOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of spaces the list markers are indented.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.ListData.Padding
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the list item contents in the source text line.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.ListData.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the number for the first list item if is set to .

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.ListData.BulletChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used for unordered lists. Used if is set to .

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.ListData.ListType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type (ordered or unordered) of this list.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.ListData.Delimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the character that follows the number if is set to .

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.ListData.IsTight
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the list is tight (such list will not render additional explicit paragraph elements).

member.name: M:CommonMark.Formatter.Printer.PrintBlocks(System.IO.TextWriter,CommonMark.Syntax.Block,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write the block data to the given writer.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.ListDelimiter
member.summary: Defines the delimeter used in the source for ordered lists.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.ListDelimiter.Period
member.summary: The item numbering is followed with a period (1. foo).

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.ListDelimiter.Parenthesis
member.summary: The item numbering is followed with a closing parenthesis (1) foo).

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.ListType
member.summary: Defines the type of a list block element.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.ListType.Bullet
member.summary: The list is unordered and its items are represented with bullets.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.ListType.Ordered
member.summary: The list is ordered and its items are numbered.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.Reference
member.summary: Represents a parsed reference link definition.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.Reference.MaximumReferenceLabelLength
member.summary: Represents the maximum allowed length of a reference definition (foo in [foo]: /url).

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.Reference.SelfReference
member.summary: A special constant reference that represents an collapsed reference link: [foo][]

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.Reference.InvalidReference
member.summary: A special constant reference that signifies that the reference label was not found: [foo][bar]

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Reference.Label
member.summary: Gets or sets the label (the key by which it is referenced in the mapping) of the reference.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Reference.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the reference.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.Reference.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the reference (used in <a title="...">).

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.Subject.Buffer
member.summary: Gets or sets the whole buffer this instance is created over.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.Subject.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the current position in the buffer.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.Subject.LastInline
member.summary: The last top-level inline parsed from this subject.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.Subject.LastPendingInline
member.summary: The last entry of the current stack of possible emphasis openers. Can be null.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Parser.Subject.FirstPendingInline
member.summary: The first entry of the current stack of possible emphasis openers. Can be null.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent
member.summary: Registers blocks of string data together so that it is not needed to concatenate multiple substrings together - thus reducing memory usage and number of string instances.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.Append(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Appends a part of the given string data to this instance.
member.param: The source string.
The index of the first character that will be appended.
The length of the substring that will be appended.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.ToString
member.summary: Returns all of the data as a single string.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.WriteTo(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Writes the data contained in this instance to the given text writer.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.StartsWith(System.Char)
member.summary: Checks if the first character of the string content matches the given.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.TrimStart(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a given number of characters from the beginning of this instance.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.IndexOf(System.Char)
member.summary: Reports the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified character in this instance.
member.returns: The zero-based index position of value if that character is found, or -1 if it is not.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.TakeFromStart(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a substring starting at the beginning this instance with the given length. Optionally the returned characters are removed from this instance.
member.param: The number of characters to return.
If set to true, the characters are removed from this instance.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.IsFirstLineBlank
member.summary: Determines if the first line of this instance contains only spaces.

member.name: M:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.RemoveTrailingBlankLines
member.summary: Removes any trailing blank lines.

member.name: P:CommonMark.Syntax.StringContent.Length
member.summary: Gets the total length of string data.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Syntax.StringPart
member.summary: Represents a part of .

member.summary: Gets or sets the string object this part is created from.

member.summary: Gets or sets the index at which this part starts.

member.name: F:CommonMark.Syntax.StringPart.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the part.

member.name: T:CommonMark.Utilities
member.summary: Reusable utility functions, not directly related to parsing or formatting data.

The arguments for the formatting placeholders.

member.summary: Checks if the given character is an Unicode space or punctuation character.
